mapper.select: select * from (select result1.*, rownum as rnum from (select num,userid,title,content,regdate,viewCount from board_free order by num desc) result1) where rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
mapper.update: update board_free set viewCount=viewCount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select max(rownum) as count from board_free
mapper.update: update board_free set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
